sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers. You can choose the appropriate BUILD32 and BUILD64 from the table at the bottom of the page.

screen.userinput: export BUILD64="[BUILD64 entries]" export GCCTARGET=[GCCTARGET entries]"

sect1.para: Lets add the build flags to ~/.bashrc to prevent issues if we stop and come back later.

screen.userinput: echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export GCCTARGET=\""${GCCTARGET}\"" >> ~/.bashrc
